text: kaho, "kya main tumhen inase uttam cheej ka pata doon?" jo log allaah ka dar rakhenge unake lie unake rab ke paas baag hai, jinake neeche naharen bah raheen hogee. unamen ve sadaiv rahenge. vahaan paak-saaf jode honge aur allaah kee prasannata praapt hogee. aur allaah apane bandon par nazar rakhata hai
